subject: Football
Pro Bowl
lead_paragraph: After receiving a promise from players that the game will be more competitive, the N.F.L. said Wednesday that it would hold the Pro Bowl in Honolulu next Jan. 27, a week before the Super Bowl.
snippet: After receiving a promise from players that the game will be more competitive, the N.F.L. said Wednesday that it would hold the Pro Bowl in Honolulu next Jan. 27, a week before the Super Bowl.
